com.capgemini.cobigen.api

Interface InputInterpreter

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CobiGen

    public interface InputInterpreter
    The implements operations for reading or processing inputs.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean combinesMultipleInputs(Object input)
      Checks whether there is at least one input reader, which interprets the given input as combined input.
      Object read(Path path, Charset inputCharset, Object... additionalArguments)
      Reads the content at a path via the first fitting InputReader and returns a CobiGen compliant input
      Object read(String type, Path path, Charset inputCharset, Object... additionalArguments)
      Reads the content at a path via a fitting InputReader and returns a CobiGen compliant input
      List<Object> resolveContainers(Object input)
      Resolves any input, which serves as a container and returns the list of contained inputs, which are valid for generation.

    • Method Detail

      • combinesMultipleInputs

        boolean combinesMultipleInputs(Object input)
        Checks whether there is at least one input reader, which interprets the given input as combined input.
        Parameters:
        input - object
        Returns:
        true if there is at least one input reader, which interprets the given input as combined input,false, otherwise

      • resolveContainers

        List<Object> resolveContainers(Object input)
        Resolves any input, which serves as a container and returns the list of contained inputs, which are valid for generation.
        Parameters:
        input - container to resolve
        Returns:
        the list of matching entries in the container or the input itself if it is not a container.

      • read

        Object read(String type,
            Path path,
            Charset inputCharset,
            Object... additionalArguments)
     throws InputReaderException
        Reads the content at a path via a fitting InputReader and returns a CobiGen compliant input
        Parameters:
        type - of the input to be read. Is used to resolve a fitting InputReader
        path - the Path to the object. Can also point to a folder
        inputCharset - of the input to be used
        additionalArguments - depending on the InputReader implementation
        Returns:
        Object that is a valid input
        Throws:
        InputReaderException - if the Path cannot be read
        IllegalArgumentException - if the provided additional arguments do not suffice the used InputReader

      • read

        Object read(Path path,
            Charset inputCharset,
            Object... additionalArguments)
     throws InputReaderException
        Reads the content at a path via the first fitting InputReader and returns a CobiGen compliant input
        Parameters:
        path - the Path to the object. Can also point to a folder
        inputCharset - of the input to be used
        additionalArguments - depending on the InputReader implementation
        Returns:
        Object that is a valid input or null if the file cannot be read by any InputReader
        Throws:
        InputReaderException - if the Path cannot be read
